mapper.select: select spacesNo as spacesNo, userNo as userNo, spaceName as spaceName, spaceSummary as spaceSummary, spaceInfo as spaceInfo, email as email, phone as phone, tel as tel, spaceLink as spaceLink, postCode as postCode, address as address, addressDetail as addressDetail, instDtm as instDtm, updtDtm as updtDtm from spaces where userNo = #{userNo} order by instDtm desc, spacesNo desc
